text: I heard really loud booms and I didn't
know what they were at first and then I
realized what they were when I heard
screaming and I got up and I ran and we
went on to this stage and we hid
backstage then the alarm started going
off and we stayed there for a while and
as soon as the alarms went off everybody
just started running outside and next
thing you know everybody looks in the
you hear boom boom boom I just ran I
think the nearest forest I could hide I
called my mom I was very very scared I
had to have someone keep me calm I
managed to keep calm through at all
there was another girl who was just
freaking out they were struggling really
hard to keep her calm it was really it
was my scary I shouldn't be going
through this is my daily life I just
feel like that and I feel scared to even
go back it's been happening everywhere I
felt I've always kind of felt like
eventually it was going to happen here
too
